definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: III. [[שׁור]] (√ of foll.; Ar. 3a0ra is become raised, excited, leap, spring; NH [[שׁוֹר]] = BH, = Sab. ([[ן]])[[תַור]] SabDenkm:No. 12, 1. 3 DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 329; Ar. 3awrun, Aram. [[תּוֹרָא]], tuwro0; Nab. [[תורא]] as n.pr.m. Lzb:384 (Gk. tau=rov, Lat. taurus, Eng. steer); As. šûru, Eth. s0r:).
